Article.ArticleTitle: Emerging and Re-Emerging Enterovirus Infections: The Known Unknowns.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: From the Communicable Disease Surveillance Centre and Vaccine Preventable Disease Programme, Public Health Wales, Cardiff, United Kingdom.
